title: Scientists now know that bees can process time, a first in insects
summary:
A new study reveals that bumblebees can process the duration of flashes of light to locate food, marking the first evidence of this ability in insects. Researchers at Queen Mary University of London designed a maze where bees learned to associate short flashes of light with sweet food and long flashes with bitter food. Even without the presence of food cues, the bees could differentiate between the flashes, demonstrating their ability to process time.

This discovery challenges the previous notion that insects are simple, inflexible reflex machines. Researchers claim this is remarkable considering the flashes of light are novel and artificial stimuli. Bumblebees now join a small group of animals, including humans, who can distinguish between short and long durations, similar to understanding Morse code.

The study aims to explore the neural mechanisms behind this ability and understand cognitive differences among bees in learning time assessment. Scientists hope this finding will promote the recognition of bees as complex animals with sophisticated cognition, not just unthinking pollinators. The research also raises broader questions about our understanding of time perception, suggesting it's not solely a human trait.

Experts like Cintia Akemi Oi and Jolyon Troscianko emphasize the study's significance, highlighting the bees' sophisticated sense of time and learning abilities within and beyond their natural ecological context. They point out that bees' impressive cognitive abilities are achieved with relatively smaller brains, suggesting that complex cognition doesn't always require large brains.
chinese_title: 科学家现在知道蜜蜂可以处理时间，这在昆虫中尚属首次。
chinese_summary:
一项新研究表明熊蜂能够处理光闪的时长来定位食物，这是昆虫具备此能力的首次证据。伦敦玛丽女王大学的研究人员设计了一个迷宫，让蜜蜂学会将短光闪与甜食联系起来，将长光闪与苦味食物联系起来。即使没有食物线索，蜜蜂也能区分这些光闪，证明了它们处理时间的能力。

这一发现挑战了之前认为昆虫是简单、僵化的反射机器的观点。研究人员称，考虑到光闪是新颖的人工刺激，这一点尤其引人注目。现在，熊蜂加入了包括人类在内的一小群能够区分长短时长的动物行列，类似于理解摩尔斯电码。

该研究旨在探索这种能力背后的神经机制，并了解蜜蜂在学习时间评估方面的认知差异。科学家们希望这一发现能够促进人们将蜜蜂视为具有复杂认知能力的复杂动物，而不仅仅是不思考的授粉者。该研究还提出了关于我们对时间感知的更广泛的问题，表明时间感知不仅仅是人类的特征。

Cintia Akemi Oi 和 Jolyon Troscianko 等专家强调了这项研究的重要性，突出了蜜蜂在自然生态环境内外所表现出的复杂的时间感和学习能力。他们指出，蜜蜂令人印象深刻的认知能力是用相对较小的大脑实现的，这表明复杂的认知并不总是需要庞大的大脑。

title: Single-Celled Marine Organisms Resulted in an Influential Illustrated Book
summary:
This Literary Hub article by Michael Benson explores the profound impact of Ernst Haeckel's illustrated book, "Art Forms in Nature," which was inspired by his discovery and study of single-celled marine organisms called radiolarians.

Haeckel, initially reluctant to pursue medicine, found his calling in marine biology, particularly in studying radiolarians. These microscopic organisms, with their intricate geometric silica skeletons, captivated him. He employed innovative microscopic techniques and artistic skill to create detailed drawings, publishing his first monograph on radiolarians in 1862.

His work garnered immediate recognition, including praise from Charles Darwin. Haeckel continued to study marine life and contributed significantly to the Challenger expedition's reports, becoming a leading authority on radiolarians.

"Art Forms in Nature," published between 1899 and 1904, became Haeckel's masterpiece. The book's lithographs, created with Adolf Giltsch, showcased the beauty and complexity of natural forms, especially radiolarians. The book's influence extended beyond science, inspiring artists, architects, and designers of the Art Nouveau and Jugendstil movements. Even a grand architectural structure, the Porte Monumentale for the 1900 Paris Exposition, was based on Haeckel's radiolarian illustrations.

The article emphasizes the lasting impact of Haeckel's work, particularly "Art Forms in Nature," which remains an influential publication bridging art and science and revealing the intricate beauty of the natural world to a wider audience.
chinese_title: 单细胞海洋生物催生了一部极具影响力的图鉴
chinese_summary:
迈克尔·本森在文学中心发表的文章探讨了恩斯特·海克尔的插图书籍《自然界的艺术形态》的深远影响，该书的灵感来自于他对单细胞海洋生物放射虫的发现和研究。

海克尔最初不愿从事医学，后来在海洋生物学，特别是放射虫的研究中找到了自己的使命。这些微观生物，凭借其复杂的几何硅骨骼，深深地吸引了他。他运用创新的显微技术和艺术技巧创作了详细的图纸，并在1862年出版了他的第一本关于放射虫的专著。

他的作品立即获得了认可，包括查尔斯·达尔文的赞扬。 海克尔继续研究海洋生物，并为挑战者号考察报告做出了重大贡献，成为放射虫方面的权威。

《自然界的艺术形态》于1899年至1904年间出版，成为海克尔的杰作。 这本书的石版画由他与阿道夫·吉尔奇合作创作，展示了自然形态的美丽和复杂性，尤其是放射虫。 该书的影响力超越了科学，启发了新艺术运动和青年风格运动的艺术家、建筑师和设计师。 甚至一座宏伟的建筑结构，即1900年巴黎世博会的纪念门，也是基于海克尔的放射虫插图设计的。

文章强调了海克尔作品的持久影响，特别是《自然界的艺术形态》，它仍然是一本具有影响力的出版物，连接了艺术和科学，并向更广泛的读者揭示了自然界的复杂之美。

title: Pivot Robotics (YC W24) Is Hiring for an Industrial Automation Hardware Engineer
summary:
Pivot Robotics (YC W24), an AI-powered robotics company focused on automating industrial robot arms for high-mix manufacturing, is hiring a Mechanical Engineer (Controls). Their initial product targets the dangerous task of grinding metal parts, and their software is currently deployed on over 10 robots at a large cast iron foundry.

The role involves building and deploying control panels, integrating sensors and actuators with PLCs and robot controllers, designing safety systems, troubleshooting electromechanical subsystems, collaborating with software and electrical engineers, and supporting robot cell setup at customer sites. They are looking for someone with a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Mechanical, Mechatronics, or Robotics Engineering and 1-2 years of experience in mechanical design and control system integration. Key qualifications include experience building control panels, familiarity with safety hardware and standards, understanding of pneumatic systems and control loops, proficiency in CAD, hands-on experience in lab and factory settings, and willingness to travel.

The company is located in San Francisco, has a team of 6, and offers a salary of $100K - $135K with 0.40% - 0.75% equity. Pivot Robotics combines off-the-shelf robots and vision sensors with recent advances in foundation vision models to enable industrial robot arms to adapt. They are founded by Siddharth Girdhar and Vignesh Rajmohan.
chinese_title: 枢轴机器人 (YC W24) 招聘工业自动化硬件工程师
chinese_summary:
Pivot Robotics (YC W24) 正在招聘机械工程师（控制方向）。这是一家人工智能机器人公司，专注于为高多样性制造自动化工业机器人手臂。他们的首款产品针对危险的金属零件打磨任务，其软件目前已部署在一家大型铸铁厂的 10 多台机器人上。

该职位涉及构建和部署控制面板、将传感器和执行器与 PLC 和机器人控制器集成、设计安全系统、排除机电子系统故障、与软件和电气工程师协作，以及支持客户现场的机器人单元设置。 他们正在寻找拥有机械、机电一体化或机器人工程学士或硕士学位，并具有 1-2 年机械设计和控制系统集成经验的人员。 主要资格包括构建控制面板的经验、熟悉安全硬件和标准、了解气动系统和控制回路、精通 CAD、在实验室和工厂环境中拥有实践经验以及愿意出差。

该公司位于旧金山，团队有 6 人，提供 10 万美元 - 13.5 万美元的薪水和 0.40% - 0.75% 的股权。 Pivot Robotics 将现成的机器人和视觉传感器与基础视觉模型的最新进展相结合，使工业机器人手臂能够适应。 该公司由 Siddharth Girdhar 和 Vignesh Rajmohan 创立。

title: What this blog is about
summary:
Bruce Dawson's blog post, "What this blog is about," summarizes the topics he covers for a non-technical audience. He blends personal anecdotes with investigative reporting on Windows performance and stability issues.

Dawson highlights several impactful discoveries, including a Windows bug causing desktop icon rearrangement slowdowns, a Chrome/Gmail performance bug stemming from a Windows flaw, and a disk-caching bug in the Windows kernel causing build system failures. He emphasizes that his investigations led to fixes implemented by Microsoft and Google, benefiting numerous users.

He also mentions his most popular post: a recipe book for accurately comparing numbers on a computer.

Dawson concludes by sharing his background as a retired programmer focused on optimization and reliability, along with his diverse interests like unicycling, hockey, and juggling.
chinese_title: 本博客的内容
chinese_summary:
Bruce Dawson的博客文章《本博客是关于什么的》以非技术受众能够理解的方式概括了他所涵盖的主题。他将个人轶事与对Windows性能和稳定性问题的调查性报道相结合。

Dawson重点介绍了几个有影响的发现，包括一个导致桌面图标重新排列变慢的Windows漏洞，一个源于Windows缺陷的Chrome/Gmail性能漏洞，以及一个导致构建系统故障的Windows内核磁盘缓存漏洞。他强调，他的调查促成了微软和谷歌实施的修复，使众多用户受益。

他还提到了他最受欢迎的文章：一本用于准确比较计算机上的数字的食谱书。

Dawson最后分享了他作为一名专注于优化和可靠性的退休程序员的背景，以及他对独轮车、曲棍球和杂耍等各种兴趣。

title: EXIF orientation info in PNGs isn't used for image-orientation: from-image
summary:
This bug report details an issue in Firefox where the `image-orientation: from-image` CSS property does not correctly interpret EXIF orientation data embedded within PNG images, unlike JPEGs and other browsers like Safari and Chrome. This results in incorrect rotation of PNG images compared to their intended display, even when the EXIF data specifies a rotation (e.g., "Rotate 90 CW").

The reporter, Eric Portis, provided a test case URL demonstrating the discrepancy. Further investigation revealed that Firefox, along with Chrome and Safari, doesn't properly handle EXIF data appended to the end of PNG files, potentially due to progressive rendering concerns. Safari, however, does respect EXIF orientation data if it appears earlier in the file.

Cameron McCormack noted that PNG supports orientation data through the eXif chunk, and implementation would be possible, especially if the chunk appears before the image data. The bug was eventually marked as a duplicate of bug 1682759, implying that the fix for the latter should also address this issue. The issue is considered a parity problem with Chrome and Safari and a web compatibility concern. The W3C PNG specification supports this functionality. Finally, after waiting nearly 5 years, the bug was closed as RESOLVED/DUPLICATE.
chinese_title: PNG图像中的EXIF方向信息不用于image-orientation: from-image
chinese_summary:
此错误报告详细描述了 Firefox 浏览器中 `image-orientation: from-image` CSS 属性无法正确解析 PNG 图像中嵌入的 EXIF 图像方向数据的缺陷，与 JPEG 以及 Safari 和 Chrome 等其他浏览器不同。这导致 PNG 图像的旋转方向与预期显示不符，即使 EXIF 数据指定了旋转（例如，“顺时针旋转 90 度”）。

报告人 Eric Portis 提供了一个测试用例 URL 来展示这种差异。进一步调查显示，Firefox 连同 Chrome 和 Safari，都无法正确处理附加在 PNG 文件末尾的 EXIF 数据，这可能是由于渐进式渲染的考虑。然而，Safari 如果 EXIF 方向数据出现在文件的前面，则会识别它。

Cameron McCormack 指出，PNG 通过 eXif 数据块支持方向数据，并且实现是可能的，尤其是在数据块出现在图像数据之前的情况下。该错误最终被标记为 bug 1682759 的副本，这意味着后者的修复也应该解决这个问题。该问题被认为是与 Chrome 和 Safari 之间的奇偶校验问题以及 Web 兼容性问题。W3C PNG 规范支持此功能。最后，经过近 5 年的等待，该错误已关闭，状态为 RESOLVED/DUPLICATE (已解决/重复)。

title: Prozac 'no better than placebo' for treating children with depression, experts
summary:
A new review of trial data suggests that Prozac (fluoxetine) is no more effective than a placebo in treating depression in children and adolescents, prompting experts to call for changes in clinical guidelines. Researchers conducted a meta-analysis of 12 Prozac trials between 1997 and 2024 and found the drug's improvement in depressive symptoms to be clinically insignificant, while carrying risks of side effects like weight gain, sleep disturbance, concentration problems, and increased suicidal ideation.

The authors argue that current guidelines in the UK, US, and Canada ignore evidence of Prozac's ineffectiveness compared to placebo and continue to recommend it for young people with depression. They advocate for a focus on understanding the underlying causes of depression in young people and addressing contributing factors through alternative methods.

While NICE recommends psychological therapies as first-line treatment for children and young people with depression, they also state antidepressants may be considered in combination with psychological therapy for moderate to severe depression in some cases and only under regular specialist supervision.

The long-term effects of antidepressants in children are poorly understood, and some research suggests long-term side effects can persist after stopping medication. A Royal College of Psychiatrists' spokesperson urged caution in interpreting the study, emphasizing that clinical guidelines consider factors beyond average effect size, including safety and patient preferences.
chinese_title: 专家称，百忧解治疗儿童抑郁症并不比安慰剂有效
chinese_summary:
一项对试验数据的新审查表明，百忧解（氟西汀）在治疗儿童和青少年抑郁症方面并不比安慰剂更有效，促使专家呼吁修改临床指南。研究人员对1997年至2024年间的12项百忧解试验进行了荟萃分析，发现该药物对抑郁症状的改善在临床上不显著，同时存在体重增加、睡眠障碍、注意力不集中和自杀意念增加等副作用风险。

作者认为，英国、美国和加拿大目前的指南忽视了百忧解与安慰剂相比无效的证据，并继续建议将其用于患有抑郁症的年轻人。他们主张将重点放在理解年轻人抑郁症的根本原因，并通过替代方法解决促成因素。

虽然 NICE 建议将心理疗法作为治疗儿童和青少年抑郁症的一线治疗方法，但他们也表示，在某些情况下，对于中度至重度抑郁症，可以考虑将抗抑郁药与心理疗法结合使用，并且只能在定期的专家监督下进行。

抗抑郁药对儿童的长期影响知之甚少，一些研究表明，长期副作用在停药后仍可能持续存在。英国皇家精神科医学院的一位发言人敦促谨慎解读该研究，并强调临床指南会考虑平均效应量之外的因素，包括安全性和患者偏好。

title: Set Theory with Types
summary:
This article discusses the use of typed set theory as an alternative to Zermelo-Fraenkel (ZF) set theory in mathematics and formalization. It contrasts the "everything is a set" approach of ZF with type theory, where elements must belong to a predefined type or class, preventing nonsensical constructions like x ∈ x.

The author highlights de Bruijn's 1973 paper advocating "Set Theory with Type Restrictions" as a motivation for the AUTOMATH language. De Bruijn questioned the necessity of a vast, universal set in ZF, arguing that typed systems are sufficient for most mathematical purposes. The author, drawing from experience with Isabelle/HOL, supports this view.

The article explains how typed set theory, derived from Principia Mathematica and formalized in higher-order logic, offers advantages such as intuitive handling of sets and predicates. It describes the elements of typed set theory: typed union, intersection, complements, powersets, function spaces, etc.

While ZF set theory has benefits, the author points out that it is much larger than necessary for many applications and the article argues that by incorporating ZF as a separate type within higher-order logic, one can retain the flexibility and benefits of both systems. Further, the author introduces hereditarily finite sets (hf) as a simpler approach to set theory within higher-order logic, suitable for modelling data and state spaces in computing.
chinese_title: 带类型的集合论
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了使用类型集合论作为数学和形式化中策梅洛-弗兰克尔 (ZF) 集合论的替代方案。它将 ZF 的“一切皆集合”方法与类型理论进行对比，后者要求元素必须属于预定义的类型或类，从而避免了诸如 x ∈ x 这样的无意义结构。

作者强调了 de Bruijn 1973 年的论文，该论文提倡“带类型限制的集合论”，以此作为 AUTOMATH 语言的动机。De Bruijn 质疑 ZF 中庞大的通用集合的必要性，认为类型系统足以满足大多数数学目的。作者借鉴了 Isabelle/HOL 的经验，支持这一观点。

本文解释了源自《数学原理》并在高阶逻辑中形式化的类型集合论如何提供诸多优势，例如对集合和谓词的直观处理。它描述了类型集合论的要素：类型化并集、交集、补集、幂集、函数空间等。

虽然 ZF 集合论具有优势，但作者指出，对于许多应用来说，它过于庞大。本文认为，通过将 ZF 作为高阶逻辑中的一个独立类型，可以保留两个系统的灵活性和优势。此外，作者介绍了世袭有限集 (hf) 作为高阶逻辑中一种更简单的集合论方法，适用于在计算中建模数据和状态空间。

title: Nano Banana Pro
summary:
Google DeepMind introduces Nano Banana Pro, a state-of-the-art image generation and editing model built on Gemini 3 Pro. Building upon the previous Nano Banana model, the Pro version offers enhanced reasoning and real-world knowledge for superior image creation.

Key features include generating accurate, context-rich visuals based on improved reasoning and access to real-time information via Google Search integration. Nano Banana Pro excels at producing images with accurate and legible text in multiple languages, enabling the creation of mockups, posters, and localized content.

The model provides high-fidelity visuals with consistent branding, supporting up to 14 image inputs while maintaining the consistency of multiple people. It boasts advanced creative controls, including localized editing, camera angle adjustments, focus manipulation, and sophisticated color grading. Output resolutions of 2K and 4K are available.

Nano Banana Pro is accessible across various Google products. It's rolling out in the Gemini app, Google Ads, Workspace (Google Slides and Vids), Gemini API, Google AI Studio, Google Antigravity, Vertex AI, and Flow (Google's AI filmmaking tool).

To promote transparency, all images generated by Google's AI tools are embedded with SynthID digital watermarks, and a verification tool is available in the Gemini app to check if an image was AI-generated by Google. A visible watermark is used for free and Google AI Pro tier users, while it is removed for Google AI Ultra subscribers and within Google AI Studio.
chinese_title: 纳米香蕉 Pro
chinese_summary:
谷歌DeepMind推出Nano Banana Pro，基于Gemini 3 Pro构建的先进图像生成和编辑模型。在先前Nano Banana模型的基础上，Pro版本提供增强的推理能力和现实世界知识，以实现卓越的图像创作。

主要功能包括基于改进的推理和通过Google搜索集成访问实时信息来生成准确、富含上下文的视觉效果。 Nano Banana Pro擅长生成具有准确且清晰的多语言文本的图像，从而能够创建模型、海报和本地化内容。

该模型提供具有一致品牌的高保真视觉效果，支持高达14个图像输入，同时保持多个人物的一致性。 它拥有先进的创意控制，包括本地化编辑、相机角度调整、焦点操作和复杂的色彩分级。 提供2K和4K的输出分辨率。

Nano Banana Pro可在各种Google产品中使用。 它正在 Gemini 应用、Google Ads、Workspace（Google Slides和Vids）、Gemini API、Google AI Studio、Google Antigravity、Vertex AI 和 Flow（Google 的 AI 电影制作工具）中推出。

为了提高透明度，所有由 Google AI 工具生成的图像都嵌入了 SynthID 数字水印，并且 Gemini 应用中提供了一个验证工具来检查图像是否由 Google AI 生成。 可见水印用于免费和 Google AI Pro 层用户，而 Google AI Ultra 订阅者和 Google AI Studio 内将删除水印。

title: Brazil's ex-president Bolsonaro arrested to prevent 'escape' court says
summary:
Former Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro was arrested at his residence in Brasília to prevent a potential "attempted escape" before he was due to begin a prison sentence for leading a coup attempt. The arrest warrant was requested by the Federal Police and authorized by the Supreme Court.

The Supreme Court cited concerns about a vigil organized by Bolsonaro's son, Senator Flávio Bolsonaro, potentially growing into a large-scale event that could facilitate Bolsonaro's escape. The court also received information about a violation of Bolsonaro's electronic monitoring equipment, further fueling suspicions of an escape plan.

Bolsonaro's lawyers are appealing the arrest, dismissing claims of an escape attempt, and highlighting his delicate health, arguing his imprisonment could endanger his life. They also defended the right to assembly in reference to the planned vigil.

Bolsonaro was sentenced earlier this year to 27 years in prison for plotting to remain in power after losing the 2022 election to Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva and has been under house arrest. He was convicted on multiple charges, including plotting a coup, being part of a criminal organization, and inciting violence against state institutions during the January 8, 2023 storming of government buildings by his supporters. Bolsonaro maintains the trial is a political witch hunt. Several high-ranking military officials and a federal police officer were also recently sentenced for their involvement in the coup attempt.
chinese_title: 巴西前总统博索纳罗被捕，法院称以防“逃逸”
chinese_summary:
巴西前总统博索纳罗在其巴西利亚住所被捕，以防止其在因领导政变企图而即将开始服刑前“试图逃脱”。逮捕令由联邦警察提出，并经最高法院授权。

最高法院援引了对其子，参议员弗拉维奥·博索纳罗组织的守夜活动的担忧，认为该活动可能演变成大规模事件，从而为博索纳罗的逃脱提供便利。法院还收到有关博索纳罗电子监控设备被破坏的信息，进一步加剧了对其逃跑计划的怀疑。

博索纳罗的律师正在对逮捕提出上诉，驳斥了逃跑企图的说法，并强调了他脆弱的健康状况，认为他的监禁可能会危及他的生命。他们还为计划举行的守夜活动辩护，认为这是集会的权利。

博索纳罗今年早些时候被判处 27 年徒刑，罪名是企图在 2022 年大选中输给路易斯·伊纳西奥·卢拉·达席尔瓦后继续掌权，目前已被软禁。他被判犯有多项罪名，包括策划政变、参与犯罪组织以及煽动暴力袭击国家机构，即 2023 年 1 月 8 日其支持者冲击政府大楼事件。博索纳罗坚称审判是政治迫害。多名高级军事官员和一名联邦警察也因参与政变企图而于近日被判刑。

title: Libpng 1.6.51: Four buffer overflow vulnerabilities fixed
summary:
This announcement details the release of libpng 1.6.51 to address four buffer overflow vulnerabilities (CVE-2025-64505, CVE-2025-64506, CVE-2025-64720, and CVE-2025-65018) affecting versions 1.6.0 through 1.6.50. Two vulnerabilities are rated high severity and two are moderate.

*   **CVE-2025-64505 (Moderate):** Heap buffer over-read in `png_do_quantize` due to a malformed palette index.
*   **CVE-2025-64506 (Moderate):** Heap buffer over-read in `png_write_image_8bit` with specific input settings.
*   **CVE-2025-64720 (High):** Out-of-bounds read in `png_image_read_composite` due to palette premultiplication.
*   **CVE-2025-65018 (High):** Heap buffer overflow in `png_combine_row` when processing 16-bit interlaced PNGs with 8-bit output.

Exploitation requires user interaction via processing a malicious PNG file. Consequences range from information disclosure and denial of service to, potentially, arbitrary code execution in certain heap configurations for CVE-2025-65018. Fixes for each CVE are provided via links to GitHub commits. It's crucial to apply both commits for CVE-2025-65018. Users are strongly advised to upgrade to libpng 1.6.51 immediately. The vulnerabilities were discovered and reported by Samsung-PENTEST, weijinjinnihao, and yosiimich, with analysis from Fabio Gritti and John Bowler.
chinese_title: Libpng 1.6.51：修复四个缓冲区溢出漏洞
chinese_summary:
该公告详细说明了 libpng 1.6.51 的发布，旨在解决影响 1.6.0 至 1.6.50 版本的四个缓冲区溢出漏洞 (CVE-2025-64505、CVE-2025-64506、CVE-2025-64720 和 CVE-2025-65018)。 其中两个漏洞的严重等级为高，两个为中。

*   **CVE-2025-64505（中等）：** 由于错误的调色板索引，`png_do_quantize` 中存在堆缓冲区过度读取。
*   **CVE-2025-64506（中等）：** 在特定输入设置下，`png_write_image_8bit` 中存在堆缓冲区过度读取。
*   **CVE-2025-64720（高）：** 由于调色板预乘，`png_image_read_composite` 中存在越界读取。
*   **CVE-2025-65018（高）：** 处理具有 8 位输出的 16 位隔行 PNG 时，`png_combine_row` 中存在堆缓冲区溢出。

利用漏洞需要用户通过处理恶意 PNG 文件进行交互。后果包括信息泄露和拒绝服务，以及对于 CVE-2025-65018，在某些堆配置中可能导致任意代码执行。 每个 CVE 的修复程序都通过 GitHub 提交链接提供。 对于 CVE-2025-65018，必须应用所有提交。 强烈建议用户立即升级到 libpng 1.6.51。 这些漏洞由 Samsung-PENTEST、weijinjinnihao 和 yosiimich 发现并报告，Fabio Gritti 和 John Bowler 进行了分析。

title: I converted a rotary phone into a meeting handset
summary:
The author, driven by a "burning hatred" of meetings and inspired by a coworker's comment, converted a vintage Siemens rotary phone into a meeting handset. The goal was to create a satisfying way to "slam down" the phone during frustrating virtual meetings.

The project involved modifying the phone to function as both a sound card and a keyboard for meeting control. The author initially attempted to use an RP2040 microcontroller to act as both, leveraging an LLM (Claude Opus) to write the necessary code. After spending $50 and finding the code becoming increasingly buggy, the author switched to Plan B.

Plan B involved using a USB hub to connect a cheap $1.69 USB sound card and the RP2040 (as a keyboard) to the computer with a single USB connection. Custom 3D-printed connectors were used to connect the phone's internal wiring to the sound card components. The RP2040 was programmed to detect when the handset was hung up and to send specific keystrokes to exit the meeting, and also to emulate a keyboard input of the number dialed on the rotary dial.

The final setup involved the USB hub connecting the sound card (modified with soldered pins for the handset connectors) and the RP2040 (connected to the phone's hook and rotary dial) to the computer. A video demonstrates the successful "hanging up" action. The code for the project is available on GitHub.
chinese_title: 我把转盘电话改造成了会议听筒。
chinese_summary:
作者出于对会议的“深恶痛绝”和一位同事的启发，将一台老式西门子转盘电话改造成了会议听筒。 目标是创造一种令人满意的方式，可以在令人沮丧的虚拟会议期间“狠狠挂断”电话。

该项目涉及修改电话，使其既能用作声卡，又能用作键盘以控制会议。 作者最初尝试使用 RP2040 微控制器来同时实现这两个功能，并利用 LLM (Claude Opus) 来编写必要的代码。 在花费了 50 美元并发现代码变得越来越有错误之后，作者切换到了备用方案。

备用方案包括使用 USB 集线器将一个廉价的 1.69 美元 USB 声卡和 RP2040（作为键盘）通过单个 USB 连接连接到计算机。 使用定制的 3D 打印连接器将电话的内部线路连接到声卡组件。 RP2040 被编程为检测到听筒挂断时发送特定的击键以退出会议，并模拟在转盘上拨打的号码的键盘输入。

最终设置包括 USB 集线器将声卡（用焊接引脚修改以连接听筒连接器）和 RP2040（连接到电话的挂钩和转盘）连接到计算机。 一个视频演示了成功的“挂断”动作。 该项目的代码可在 GitHub 上找到。

title: 3D printing with unconventional vase mode
summary:
This article explores unconventional uses of vase mode in 3D printing, targeting advanced users familiar with the basics. Vase mode typically prints single-perimeter hollow objects quickly and without seams, but lacks internal geometry, supports, and top layers.

The article details tricks to extend vase mode's functionality:

*   **Internal geometry via slits:** Adding thin (0.0001mm) slits to the model allows the slicer to create internal supports, essentially modelling your own infill. Crucially, the "slice gap closing radius" in PrusaSlicer must be set to 0.
*   **Double walls:** By creating a slit into the hollow interior and ensuring the part's width matches two perimeters, you can achieve a double-walled vase mode print for increased strength. This can be extended to anchor internal geometry to the walls.
*   **Extrusion width:** Increasing the extrusion width (up to 2x the nozzle diameter or beyond) can further enhance the strength of vase mode prints.
*   **Fake vase mode:** Mimics vase mode by manually configuring slicer settings: single perimeter, no top layers/infill/supports, and disabling "ensure vertical shell thickness." While lacking the continuous spiral, it offers flexibility to tailor settings to specific areas of the print. Scarf seams can hide seam artifacts.

The article uses a case study of printing spheres on sticks to illustrate "fake vase mode" and the advantages of fine-tuning settings. It concludes that vase mode and "fake vase mode" are underused for functional parts, saving weight and print time. The author provides a cheat sheet summarizing key points and settings.
chinese_title: 非常规花瓶模式3D打印
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了3D打印花瓶模式的非常规应用，目标是熟悉基础知识的高级用户。花瓶模式通常快速打印单层空心物体且无接缝，但缺乏内部几何结构、支撑和顶层。

本文详细介绍了扩展花瓶模式功能的技巧：

*   **通过狭缝实现内部几何结构：** 在模型中添加薄（0.0001毫米）的狭缝，使切片软件能够创建内部支撑，本质上是模拟您自己的填充。 关键是，PrusaSlicer中的“切片间隙闭合半径”必须设置为0。
*   **双层壁：** 通过在空心内部创建一个狭缝，并确保零件的宽度与两个周长匹配，您可以实现双层壁花瓶模式打印，从而提高强度。 这可以扩展到将内部几何结构锚定到壁上。
*   **挤出宽度：** 增加挤出宽度（高达喷嘴直径的2倍或更高）可以进一步提高花瓶模式打印的强度。
*   **伪花瓶模式：** 通过手动配置切片软件设置来模拟花瓶模式：单层周长，无顶层/填充/支撑，并禁用“确保垂直外壳厚度”。 虽然缺乏连续螺旋，但它提供了灵活性，可以根据打印的特定区域定制设置。 倾斜接缝可以隐藏接缝伪影。

本文使用在棒子上打印球体的案例研究来说明“伪花瓶模式”以及微调设置的优势。 结论是，花瓶模式和“伪花瓶模式”在功能性零件中未得到充分利用，从而节省了重量和打印时间。 作者提供了一份备忘单，总结了关键点和设置。

title: Command Lines
summary:
This article, titled "Command Lines," explores the rapidly evolving landscape of AI coding assistants and their impact on software development. It highlights the exponential growth of the AI coding tool market, driven by engineers eager to improve productivity, and posits that this market is segmenting into three user types: Handcrafted Coders (skeptical of AI), Vibe Coders (non-engineers using AI for rapid prototyping), and Architect + AI Coders (engineers strategically using AI for boilerplate and routine tasks).

The author divides the market into "Hands-off" tools for non-engineers (like Lovable and Replit) and "Hands-on" tools for professional developers (like Cursor and Github Copilot). The article mentions Cursor's significant revenue growth and its development of in-house models like Composer-2.

The article argues that model quality is a key differentiator in the AI coding space, citing Claude Code's rise in popularity. Despite newcomers, incumbents like Microsoft (Github Copilot) leverage existing customer relationships and bundling to maintain market share. The author concludes by emphasizing that AI coding tools are liberating engineers from mundane tasks, allowing them to focus on higher-level thinking. The ultimate winner will be the tool delivering the best model quality, features beyond basic functionality, and user stickiness.
chinese_title: 命令行
chinese_summary:
本文题为“命令行”，探讨了人工智能编码助手快速发展的态势及其对软件开发的影响。文章强调了人工智能编码工具市场的指数级增长，这是由渴望提高生产力的工程师所推动的，并认为该市场正在细分为三种用户类型：手工编码者（对人工智能持怀疑态度）、氛围编码者（非工程师使用人工智能进行快速原型设计）和架构师+人工智能编码者（工程师战略性地使用人工智能进行样板代码和常规任务）。

作者将市场划分为面向非工程师的“放手”工具（如Lovable和Replit）和面向专业开发人员的“亲力亲为”工具（如Cursor和Github Copilot）。文章提到了Cursor显著的收入增长及其内部模型（如Composer-2）的开发。

文章认为模型质量是人工智能编码领域的一个关键差异化因素，并引用了Claude Code日益增长的受欢迎程度。尽管有新进入者，但像微软（Github Copilot）这样的现有企业利用现有的客户关系和捆绑销售来维持市场份额。作者最后强调，人工智能编码工具正在将工程师从繁琐的任务中解放出来，使他们能够专注于更高层次的思考。最终的赢家将是提供最佳模型质量、超越基本功能的特性以及用户粘性的工具。

title: Infinibay LXD Container
summary:
This document describes the Infinibay LXD deployment, a containerized solution for the Infinibay VDI management platform using LXD (Linux Containers). It offers advantages like native KVM access, full systemd support, and better security isolation compared to privileged mode containers. The deployment supports multiple Linux distributions by automatically detecting the package manager and LXD installation method.

The architecture comprises four LXD containers: `infinibay-postgres` (database), `infinibay-redis` (cache), `infinibay-backend` (API, libvirt-node, infiniservice, KVM access), and `infinibay-frontend` (web interface).

The document provides a quick start guide, including installation instructions, environment configuration, and commands for deploying and managing the containers. Key commands include `setup.sh` (installs LXD and dependencies), `newgrp lxd` (activates LXD group membership), and `run.sh` (manages containers, provisioning, and starting services). The `run.sh` script offers various subcommands for tasks like applying configurations, provisioning, destroying, restarting, and checking container status.

The article highlights the intelligent orchestration provided by `run.sh`, which automatically handles container creation, provisioning, and starting. It also details the current status of the implementation, highlighting completed features like automated provisioning scripts, resource limits, shared directories, and network connectivity. It also mentions manual steps still required, like installing npm dependencies, running database migrations, and starting Infinibay services. Finally, it compares the LXD deployment with the native Infinibay installer, recommending the latter for production use until the LXD provisioning is fully automated.
chinese_title: Infinibay LXD 容器
chinese_summary:
本文档描述了 Infinibay LXD 部署，这是一种用于 Infinibay VDI 管理平台的容器化解决方案，采用 LXD（Linux 容器）。相比于特权模式容器，它具有原生 KVM 访问、完整的 systemd 支持以及更好的安全隔离等优势。该部署通过自动检测软件包管理器和 LXD 安装方法，支持多种 Linux 发行版。

该架构包含四个 LXD 容器：`infinibay-postgres` (数据库)、`infinibay-redis` (缓存)、`infinibay-backend` (API、libvirt-node、infiniservice、KVM 访问) 和 `infinibay-frontend` (Web 界面)。

本文档提供了一个快速入门指南，包括安装说明、环境配置以及用于部署和管理容器的命令。关键命令包括 `setup.sh` (安装 LXD 和依赖项)、`newgrp lxd` (激活 LXD 组成员身份) 和 `run.sh` (管理容器、配置和启动服务)。`run.sh` 脚本提供各种子命令，用于执行应用配置、配置、销毁、重启和检查容器状态等任务。

文章强调了 `run.sh` 提供的智能编排，它可以自动处理容器创建、配置和启动。它还详细介绍了当前实现的状况，突出了已完成的功能，如自动化配置脚本、资源限制、共享目录和网络连接。同时，它也提及了仍然需要手动执行的步骤，例如安装 npm 依赖项、运行数据库迁移和启动 Infinibay 服务。最后，它将 LXD 部署与原生 Infinibay 安装程序进行了比较，建议在 LXD 配置完全自动化之前，在生产环境中使用后者。

title: Android and iPhone users can now share files, starting with the Pixel 10
summary:
Google is introducing a new feature that allows Android's Quick Share to work seamlessly with Apple's AirDrop, making file sharing between Android devices (specifically the Pixel 10 family initially) and iPhones much easier. The key motivation is to simplify file sharing between friends and family, regardless of their mobile operating system.

The feature prioritizes security, incorporating strong safeguards tested by independent security experts to protect user data. This move towards cross-platform compatibility follows Google's previous efforts with RCS messaging and unknown tracker alerts, indicating a commitment to improving interoperability between different operating systems.

The rollout begins with the Pixel 10 family of devices and the company intends to expand availability to more Android devices in the future. Users can see the feature in action on the Pixel 10 Pro via an accompanying video.
chinese_title: 安卓和iPhone用户现在可以共享文件了，从Pixel 10开始。
chinese_summary:
谷歌推出新功能，让安卓“快速分享”与苹果“隔空投送”无缝协作，简化安卓设备（初期为Pixel 10系列）与iPhone之间的文件共享。主要目的是方便亲友间的文件共享，无论他们使用何种移动操作系统。

该功能优先考虑安全性，整合了经独立安全专家测试的强大安全措施，以保护用户数据。 此次跨平台兼容性举措，延续了谷歌之前在RCS消息和未知追踪器警报方面的努力，表明其致力于提升不同操作系统之间的互操作性。

该功能首先在Pixel 10系列设备上推出，公司计划未来将其扩展到更多安卓设备。 用户可以通过一段配套视频，在Pixel 10 Pro上看到该功能的实际应用。

title: Homeschooling hits record numbers
summary:
Homeschooling in the U.S. is experiencing significant growth, far exceeding pre-pandemic levels and continuing its upward trend even after the lifting of COVID-19 restrictions. Data from multiple states indicates a substantial increase in homeschooling rates, with some states reporting record highs. While a few states have seen slight declines, the overall trend demonstrates a strong and sustained interest in DIY education.

Experts attribute this surge to growing dissatisfaction with traditional public schools, citing concerns about rigidity, politicization, poor results, and experiences during the pandemic. Parents are seeking alternatives that align with their preferences and offer greater control over their children's education.

Homeschooling is not the only beneficiary of this shift. Other non-public options like private and charter schools are also seeing changes in enrollment. Research suggests that public schools could face significant enrollment declines in the coming years as families increasingly choose alternative educational paths.

Parental dissatisfaction with K-12 education is at a decade high, with a majority believing it's heading in the wrong direction. Homeschooling enjoys a high favorability rating among parents, reflecting a growing acceptance and preference for this educational approach. The pandemic exposed shortcomings in remote learning and highlighted concerns about curriculum quality and potential indoctrination, further driving families toward homeschooling and other alternatives. This trend indicates a fundamental shift in how American families view education, with homeschooling becoming an increasingly popular and mainstream option.
chinese_title: 在家教育人数创新高
chinese_summary:
美国家庭教育显著增长，远远超过疫情前水平，即使在取消新冠限制后，仍保持上升趋势。多州数据显示，家庭教育比例大幅增加，部分州报告创历史新高。尽管少数州略有下降，但总体趋势表明人们对自主教育的兴趣依然强烈且持久。

专家认为，这一激增源于人们对传统公立学校日益增长的不满，理由是对僵化、政治化、不良结果以及疫情期间经历的担忧。家长们正在寻求符合他们偏好的替代方案，并希望对孩子的教育有更大的控制权。

家庭教育并非这一转变的唯一受益者。私立学校和特许学校等其他非公立选择的入学人数也在发生变化。研究表明，随着越来越多的家庭选择替代教育途径，公立学校未来几年可能面临入学人数大幅下降。

家长对K-12教育的不满情绪达到十年来的最高点，大多数人认为它正朝着错误的方向发展。家庭教育在家长中享有很高的支持率，反映出人们对这种教育方式的接受和偏爱程度越来越高。疫情暴露了远程学习的缺点，并突显了对课程质量和潜在灌输的担忧，进一步推动家庭转向家庭教育和其他替代方案。 这一趋势表明美国家庭对教育的看法发生了根本性转变，家庭教育正成为一种越来越受欢迎和主流的选择。

title: RRules (yes handling RSCALE) using only PL/pgSQL
summary:
`rrule_plpgsql` is a pure PL/pgSQL implementation of the iCalendar RRULE (RFC 5545 & RFC 7529) for PostgreSQL, enabling recurrence calculation directly within the database.  It avoids C extensions, ensuring compatibility across all PostgreSQL environments, including managed services like AlloyDB, RDS, and Azure Database.

Key benefits include: no compilation required, full timezone support with DST handling, consistent behavior across environments, and significantly faster performance (50-75x compared to Node.js) for single-schedule operations. Its key strength lies in tight integration with the query engine, allowing for set-based operations (JOINs), native WHERE/aggregation, and memory-efficient streaming without external data transfer.

Installation is simple, using either `npm` or direct SQL installation.  The library offers comprehensive documentation, covering installation, example usage (subscription billing, batch updates, conflict detection), API reference, RFC compliance, and security.

It supports various frequencies (DAILY, WEEKLY, MONTHLY, YEARLY) and modifiers (COUNT, UNTIL, INTERVAL, BYDAY, etc.), including SKIP and RSCALE. While standard installation offers secure and commonly used frequencies, sub-day frequencies (HOURLY, MINUTELY, SECONDLY) are available via a separate installation with security warnings.

The library provides core functions for generating and querying occurrences, along with utilities like overlap detection.  Contributions are welcome, emphasizing thorough testing and adherence to RFC specifications. The library is licensed under MIT.
chinese_title: 仅使用PL/pgSQL的RRules（是的，处理RSCALE）
chinese_summary:
`rrule_plpgsql` 是 iCalendar RRULE (RFC 5545 & RFC 7529) 的一个纯 PL/pgSQL 实现，适用于 PostgreSQL，可在数据库内直接进行重复发生的计算。它避免了 C 扩展，确保在所有 PostgreSQL 环境中的兼容性，包括 AlloyDB、RDS 和 Azure Database 等托管服务。

主要优点包括：无需编译、完全支持带 DST 处理的时区、跨环境的一致行为，以及单计划操作显著更快的性能（比 Node.js 快 50-75 倍）。其关键优势在于与查询引擎的紧密集成，允许基于集合的操作（JOIN）、原生 WHERE/聚合，以及内存高效的流式传输，而无需外部数据传输。

安装简单，可以使用 `npm` 或直接 SQL 安装。该库提供全面的文档，涵盖安装、示例用法（订阅账单、批量更新、冲突检测）、API 参考、RFC 合规性和安全性。

它支持各种频率（DAILY、WEEKLY、MONTHLY、YEARLY）和修饰符（COUNT、UNTIL、INTERVAL、BYDAY 等），包括 SKIP 和 RSCALE。虽然标准安装提供安全且常用的频率，但子日频率（HOURLY、MINUTELY、SECONDLY）可通过单独安装获得，并带有安全警告。

该库提供用于生成和查询发生的事件的核心函数，以及重叠检测等实用程序。 欢迎贡献，强调彻底的测试和遵守 RFC 规范。 该库在 MIT 许可下获得许可。

title: Olmo 3: Charting a path through the model flow to lead open-source AI
summary:
Olmo 3, released by AI2 on November 20, 2025, aims to advance open-source AI by providing not only state-of-the-art language models but also the entire model flow - every stage, checkpoint, dataset, and dependency required to create and modify them. This comprehensive approach fosters trust, enables effective adaptation, collaboration, and innovation.

At the center is Olmo 3-Think (32B), a thinking model that allows inspection of intermediate reasoning traces and their origins. The Olmo 3 family includes models at 7B and 32B parameters, comprising: Olmo 3-Base (7B, 32B), a powerful base model competitive with other open-weight models in programming, reading, and math; Olmo 3-Think (7B, 32B), a reasoning model suited for RL research, long-horizon reasoning, and complex experiments; Olmo 3-Instruct (7B), a chat-focused model excelling in instruction-following and tool use; and Olmo 3-RL Zero (7B), a reinforcement learning pathway for bootstrapping complex reasoning behaviors.

Olmo 3 offers documented paths through development for various applications.  Users can customize each training stage, datasets, and RL objectives to create their own systems.  All components are released under permissive open-source licenses, including data, code, model weights, and checkpoints. Olmo 3 delivers strong performance across a broad benchmark suite, with Olmo 3-Base 32B and Olmo 3-Think 32B outperforming other fully open models in their respective categories.

Olmo 3 utilizes a decoder-only transformer architecture and multi-stage training pipeline, with focus on data curation and a new reinforcement learning framework.  Expanded training data and dataset curation methods have strengthened Olmo 3's capabilities.
chinese_title: Olmo 3：引领开源AI，在模型流程中开辟道路
chinese_summary:
AI2于2025年11月20日发布的Olmo 3旨在通过提供最先进的语言模型以及创建和修改这些模型所需的整个模型流程——每个阶段、检查点、数据集和依赖项——来推进开源AI。 这种全面的方法可以培养信任，实现有效的适应、协作和创新。

核心是Olmo 3-Think (32B)，一个思考模型，允许检查中间推理轨迹及其来源。 Olmo 3系列包括参数为7B和32B的模型，包括：Olmo 3-Base (7B, 32B)，一个强大的基础模型，在编程、阅读和数学方面与其他开放权重模型竞争；Olmo 3-Think (7B, 32B)，一个适合RL研究、长程推理和复杂实验的推理模型；Olmo 3-Instruct (7B)，一个专注于聊天的模型，擅长指令跟随和工具使用；以及Olmo 3-RL Zero (7B)，一种用于引导复杂推理行为的强化学习途径。

Olmo 3为各种应用程序提供了记录在案的开发路径。 用户可以自定义每个训练阶段、数据集和RL目标，以创建自己的系统。 所有组件均以宽松的开源许可发布，包括数据、代码、模型权重和检查点。 Olmo 3在广泛的基准测试套件中表现出色，其中Olmo 3-Base 32B和Olmo 3-Think 32B在其各自类别中优于其他完全开放的模型。

Olmo 3采用仅解码器Transformer架构和多阶段训练管道，重点关注数据管理和新的强化学习框架。 扩展的训练数据和数据集管理方法加强了Olmo 3的功能。

title: Google tells employees it must double capacity every 6 months to meet AI demand
summary:
Google is aggressively scaling its AI infrastructure to meet surging demand, aiming to double capacity every six months and achieve a thousandfold increase in 4-5 years while maintaining cost and energy efficiency. This rapid expansion is driven by both organic user interest and the integration of AI into existing services.

The company faces challenges in keeping pace with competitors like OpenAI, which is investing heavily in data centers. A key bottleneck is the limited availability of Nvidia GPUs, impacting Google's ability to deploy new AI features.

To overcome these challenges, Google is focusing on three main strategies: building physical infrastructure, developing more efficient AI models, and designing custom silicon chips, like its Tensor Processing Units (TPUs).  Google claims its latest TPU generation is significantly more power efficient.

Despite concerns about a potential AI bubble, Google believes the risk of underinvestment outweighs the risk of overcapacity, indicating a long-term commitment to AI. Google leadership anticipates intense competition in the AI landscape and pressure to meet cloud and compute demand in the coming years.
chinese_title: 谷歌告知员工需每6个月将容量翻倍以满足AI需求
chinese_summary:
谷歌正积极扩大其AI基础设施以满足激增的需求，目标是每六个月将容量翻一番，并在4-5年内实现一千倍的增长，同时保持成本和能源效率。这种快速扩张的驱动力既来自自然增长的用户兴趣，也来自AI与现有服务的整合。

该公司面临着跟上OpenAI等竞争对手步伐的挑战，后者正在大力投资数据中心。一个关键瓶颈是英伟达GPU的供应有限，影响了谷歌部署新AI功能的能力。

为了克服这些挑战，谷歌正专注于三大战略：建设物理基础设施、开发更高效的AI模型以及设计定制硅芯片，如其张量处理单元（TPU）。谷歌声称其最新一代TPU的能效显著提高。

尽管人们担心可能存在AI泡沫，但谷歌认为投资不足的风险大于产能过剩的风险，这表明了对AI的长期承诺。谷歌领导层预计未来几年AI领域的竞争将非常激烈，满足云和计算需求的压力也会增大。

title: Lester: A New Era for Rotoscoping in Indie Animation and Retro Game Development
summary:
Lester is a new rotoscoping animation and video segmentation editor designed to accelerate reference-based animation workflows for indie animation and retro game development. It offers faster workflows by automating tedious frame edits, allowing for precise editing, segmentation, and stylization. A key selling point is its complete lack of generative AI, ensuring originality, predictable results, and full user control. All processing runs locally, eliminating concerns about data privacy, cloud processing, or subscription fees.

Lester is currently available for download on Windows (CPU and GPU versions) and macOS. The developers emphasize that Lester is an evolving tool and encourage user feedback for future development. Users can report issues, suggest features, and learn more on the project's GitHub repository. A press release is also available for those interested in learning more about the project's goals and its place in modern rotoscoping workflows. In essence, Lester aims to provide a reliable and controlled environment for rotoscoping, catering to artists who prioritize precision and originality over AI-assisted solutions.
chinese_title: 莱斯特：独立动画和复古游戏开发中转描技术的新纪元
chinese_summary:
Lester：一款加速参考动画工作流程的转描动画与视频分割编辑器。它专为独立动画和复古游戏开发设计，通过自动化繁琐的帧编辑，实现精确的编辑、分割和风格化，从而提供更快速的工作流程。其关键卖点是完全不使用生成式AI，确保原创性、可预测的结果以及完全的用户控制。所有处理都在本地运行，消除了对数据隐私、云处理或订阅费用的担忧。

Lester目前可在Windows（CPU和GPU版本）和macOS上下载。开发者强调Lester是一个不断发展的工具，并鼓励用户提供反馈以供未来开发。用户可以在该项目的GitHub存储库上报告问题、建议功能并了解更多信息。感兴趣了解该项目目标及其在现代转描工作流程中地位的人，还可以查阅新闻稿。本质上，Lester旨在为转描提供一个可靠且可控的环境，迎合那些优先考虑精确性和原创性而非AI辅助解决方案的艺术家。

title: Show HN: Vibe Prolog
summary:
This "Show HN" post introduces Vibe Prolog, a Prolog interpreter created using Claude Code (AI) with $220 of free credits that were about to expire. The author, who hadn't used Prolog in 20 years, accidentally vibe-coded the interpreter on their phone over a weekend.

The project's aim is to explore the limits of AI-generated code through a set of rules: no human-written code, avoidance of intentional sloppiness, maximum tool usage (tests, code reviews, security audits), striving for high-quality AI-generated code, and maintaining a fun, lighthearted approach.

The author emphasizes caution due to the uncertain functionality and copyright status of AI-generated code, and recommends using existing, established Prolog implementations instead. However, contributions are actively encouraged, particularly in the form of "vibe contributions" via pull requests, and tool vendors are welcome to integrate their tools. The post includes examples of the interpreter in action.
chinese_title: 展示HN：Vibe Prolog
chinese_summary:
此“Show HN”帖子介绍 Vibe Prolog，一个使用 Claude Code (AI) 创建的 Prolog 解释器，花费了即将到期的 220 美元免费额度。作者已 20 年未使用 Prolog，却在一个周末通过手机偶然“vibe-coded”（随心编程）了这个解释器。

该项目的目的是通过一组规则探索 AI 生成代码的极限：无人为编写的代码，避免刻意马虎，最大程度地使用工具（测试、代码审查、安全审计），努力实现高质量的 AI 生成代码，并保持有趣、轻松的方式。

作者强调由于 AI 生成代码的功能和版权状况不确定，请谨慎使用，并建议使用现有的、成熟的 Prolog 实现。然而，作者积极鼓励大家贡献，特别是通过 pull request 的形式进行“vibe contributions”（随心贡献），并欢迎工具供应商集成他们的工具。帖子包含了解释器运行的示例。

title: Can you take an ox to Oxford?
summary:
This article explores whether the £5 Oxford congestion charge applies to an ox-drawn cart. Madeline Odent posed the initial question on Twitter, prompting an investigation into the legal definitions surrounding the charge.

The author delves into the Oxfordshire County Council's "Charging Order," which applies to Class M1 vehicles. This leads to further exploration of UK legislation, including the "Road User Charging and Workplace Parking Levy (Classes of Motor Vehicles) (England) Regulations 2001" and the Road Traffic Act 1988. The crucial point is that the legislation defines "motor vehicle" as "mechanically propelled." Since an ox is not a "mechanically propelled vehicle," it is argued that an ox-drawn cart would not be subject to the congestion charge.

The author also highlights the exclusion of certain unconventional vehicles, like Reliant Robins and Peel P50s, based on their classification within the legislative framework. Despite having number plates, these vehicles, technically exempt, would likely be charged due to the camera-based enforcement system.

The conclusion is that an ox-drawn cart, lacking a number plate and not being mechanically propelled, is exempt from Oxford's congestion charge. The article ends with a reflection on the accessibility of UK legislation and how public access promotes transparency and accountability, even when addressing seemingly absurd legal questions.

title: Tibetan Declaration of Independence
summary:
This document is a proclamation issued by the 13th Dalai Lama in 1913, effectively declaring Tibet's independence. The Dalai Lama addresses all Tibetan people, referencing a historical relationship with China based on benefactor and priest, not subordination. He recounts the events leading to his exile to India due to Chinese attempts to colonize Tibet, and the subsequent collapse of the Manchu empire, leading to the expulsion of Chinese troops.

Having returned to Tibet, the Dalai Lama outlines several duties for the Tibetan people to ensure peace, happiness, and the preservation of their nation. These include: preserving Buddhist institutions and traditions, ensuring fair governance by civil and military officials, and protecting Tibet's independence. He specifically forbids severe punishments like amputation and addresses issues of land ownership and cultivation.

The proclamation emphasizes Tibet's status as a small, religious, and independent nation that must defend itself and keep up with the rest of the world. Border residents are instructed to be vigilant and report suspicious activity, while internal development is encouraged by allowing the cultivation of vacant lands. The document concludes by directing that the proclamation be posted and recorded throughout Tibet.
